doc.after: William Shakespeare e ksp r 26 April 1564 baptised 23 April 1616 was an English poet playwright and actor widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world s pre eminent dramatist He is often called England s national poet and the Bard of Avon His extant works including some collaborations consist of about 38 plays 154 sonnets two long narrative poems and a few other verses the authorship of some of which is uncertain His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright
